name: Undergroud Trip
description:
Keep running and killing the enemies in this survival game, your goal is to stay alive and go deeper underground as you can.

Controls:

ASDW:  Move

P: Attack

Hold P: Charge Attack

Spacebar: Jump

 

How to Play:

Activate all the buttons to lower the lava, then jump down to the next floor.

Hint: The more ground blocks you lower, the easier to move it gets on next levels!
